model_answer: The correct answer is C: A green hammock he’s about to tie up. In the audio, the speaker mentions using cordage to set the ridgeline at waist level and then looping it around the first tree. He can be seen holding a green hammock in his hand as he does this.

The spoken instruction accompanying the action of tying a rope to secure the green tent and adjusting the fabric in the forest is option A: 'He says to throw the tarp over the top, pick up a stick to use as a toggle if you only have four stakes, and concludes that it’s now a regular pup-tent you can crawl into.'
